description: A customized, heavily armored Kevlar helmet, modified with leather reinforcements to provide maximum comfort and protection from harm.
A massive customized, heavily armored Kevlar helmet, modified with leather reinforcements to provide maximum comfort and protection from harm.
A customized, heavily armored steel and Kevlar helmet, modified to provide maximum comfort and protection from harm.  All the added material has made it rather heavy.

name: BL9-infused survivor helmet
description: A survivor helmet, modernized and infused with BL9, it is partially covered with almost sentient BL9 strengthening and hardening the helmet acting as a kevlar or ceramic alternative
